text: Javier Neves Mujica (1953 â€“ 11 February 2021) was a Peruvian politician. He was Minister of Labor and Promotion of Employment from 2004 to 2005 during the Alejandro Toledo administration. He was born in Lima, Peru. Neves died of COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Peru in Lima on 11 February 2021, aged 67.Fallece Javier Neves Mujica, destacado abogado y exministro de Trabajo ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Peruvian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Lima
title: Javier Neves
